sentence.Network_en: We will be orienting and interviewing more than 60 new candidates.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将会接见超过60位新申请人,并进行面试.

sentence.Network_en: Orienting the house on an east - west axis is usually best.
sentence.Network_cn: 定位在一个东西轴的房子通常是最好的.

sentence.Network_en: Noticed the bee's momentary orienting pause before heading back to the hive.
sentence.Network_cn: 注意到蜜蜂在返回蜂房前为确定方向而短暂停留.

list.abs: 方字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 方位词〖 nounoflocality〗 方向〖 direction;orientation〗 方形〖 square〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... oriental n 东方人 orientation n 定向，定位 disorient v 使迷失方向.
瑞士名表排行_爱问知识人 ... 西铁城 Citizen 东方(双狮) ORIENT 卡西欧 CASIO.
为了让东方表(ORIENT)品牌能与世界市场接轨, 在未来的数年中, 双狮牌, 双狮表, 东方双狮表等别名将会渐渐地淡化直到完全不再使用。
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... orient 东方 oriental 东方的 origin 起源.

means.word_mean: 1. positioning with respect to a reference system or determining your bearings physically or intellectually;

sentences.sentence: "noticed the bee's momentary orienting pause before heading back to the hive"

auth_sentence.content: The first thing that pops into my mind is some mechanical means of orienting small magnetic dipoles so as to attract or repel.
